keyMappings:
# Unbind ==============================================================================
unmap d
unmap u
# Tabs  ===============================================================================
map K previousTab
map J nextTab
map u restoreTab
map dd removeTab
map do closeOtherTabs
map dK moveTabLeft
map dJ moveTabRight
map dp togglePinTab
map dc duplicateTab
map dh firstTab
map dl lastTab
map dw moveTabToNewWindow
map ds Vomnibar.activateTabSelection
map ee Vomnibar.activateEditUrl
map eE Vomnibar.activateEditUrlInNewTab
map ga createTab
# scrolling ==========================================================================
map <c-j> scrollPageDown
map <c-k> scrollPageUp
map <c-d> scrollPageDown
map <c-u> scrollPageUp
map <c-f> scrollFullPageDown
map <c-b> scrollFullPageUp
# Zoom ================================================================================
map  zi zoomIn
map  zo zoomOut
map  z0 zoomReset
map  zz zoomReset
# Hint ================================================================================
map  T LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab
searchEngines:

yt: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube

di: https://duckduckgo.com/?iar=images&q=%s DuckDuckGo Images
